page.title: 11Much Marcle School
page.content: The school was built in 1833 with improvements being made in 1851. The school had 90 children on week days and 30 children on Sundays.The children came from Kynaston, Rushall, Yatton,Perrystone Hill,Lyne Down and Wiggan Ash. The children did Maths, Writing,Reading,Scripture and Games. They stayed at Much Marcle school until they were 14. The school today has 3 classrooms,large hall and staffroom. There are 65 children who come from Little Marcle,Rushall, Yatton and Kempley. Our lessons are Swimming, Maths,Musical Movement,Reading,Music, English,Religous Education,Science, Humanities and Art. We have got 3 Computers at the school. When the children are 11 they go to John Masefield High School at Ledbury.
